Can saucer stones (item) generate rares?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Can saucer stones (item) generate rares?
By OgreBattle on Friday, July 6, 2012 - 10:51 pm:

Haven't played this game in yeeeears. About to play it again, just wondering about this--I would prefer not to buy a bunch of raw CD/DVDs to burn or a memory card transfer device, but if I have to to get Baum...

By Lisa Shock on Saturday, July 7, 2012 - 11:11 am:

In this game, you have to have discs to make the rares. That said, you can probably check a lot of them out from your public library.

By OgreBattle on Saturday, July 7, 2012 - 12:04 pm:

I cannot, but thanks anyway.
